name: Game Ball Colors
description:
Another of my mini-games!

Try to arrive high enough and complete the game! 

Any feedback is really appreciated!

CONTROLS:

  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON OR SPACE to jump
  • ESC to close the game
  • F12 to enter/leave fullscreen

To delete the file that stores the high score go in:
C:\Users\"Your Computer"\AppData\Local\Game_Ball_Colors
Delete the folder.
